response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to extend this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $1,400,000. I believe this represents an exceptional deal, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a significant discount. I look forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how we can finalize this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1400000}
